Text: thanks RubrumPopulus. i dunno who marcos martin is, but the variant cover he did (which is the picture seen above) is my favorite comic cover of 2013 so far! its composition is just perfect, imho

Yep! Marcos Martin is awesome.  His most full issue interior work was the latest Daredevil series.  He was the original rotating artist with Paolo Rivera.  Before that he did a lot on Amazing Spider-Man.  He was one of the artists rotating with Humberto Ramos on the Big Time story arc.  His layouts and composition are always outstanding. :)
thanks for the info, i'm gonna download that big time trade and check out his work some more. this nova cover is my desktop background now.
